;Minimizes dangerous chemicals
;The amount of herbicides and pesticides found in conventional cotton farming provide about 25 percent of the worldwide use. Most of the pesticides soak into the fiber and they land in ones sheets and ones attire that can in turn lead to serious dermatological complications and in the worst of all situation, skin cancer. The runoff from these herbicides saturates the grounds and they can end up in the food items we ingest or even the water we take in. For that reason, buying non-chemical clothes will go very far in saving the earth.
